website_summaries.verdict: A fun, affordable claw machine with a stand-out design and easy-to-use functions.
pros: Cute rocket design that kids love
Small footprint easily fits on desk or tabletop
Doesn't require tokens to operate: just turn on the switch and go
Has lights, and the music it plays isn't too loud
cons: Doesn't come with toys, and doesn't fit quite as many as some competing models

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old is in love with this! Hours of fun. He loves Toy Story and thinks it’s The Claw from the movie. It’s just challenging enough to where it’s fun but not overly easy. The music is extremely loud but we taped over the speaker on the bottom and it helped a ton— you can still hear the music but not as obnoxiously loud.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced the rave reviews on this toy are FAKE. The toy turns on, music is okay, looks cool upon opening, the rest is garbage. Toy chute- the slightest move and toys fall out of the chute, defeating the purpose of the claw Back opening- again, wide open. There needs to be a door Music ‐ loud and annoying. I expected this. Claw- doesn't grab anything!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie g

customer_reviews.title: DON’T DO IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY THIS!!!! Just don’t do it!! Don’t do it to yourself. To the other parents. To the kids. JUST. DONT!!! It’s SO loud. I had to put 3 stickers over the speaker just to get it a normal volume! And then. It’s so lame! It doesn’t work at all. We tried 3 different kinds of candies! Laughy Taffy (WAY too big), tootsie rolls (too rolly and slippery), and HiChews which was probably the best option but it STILL wouldn’t stay in the claw long enough to get to the shoot. It was very VERY disappointing. I have no idea why it has such high reviews. I would NEVER recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice claw machine
customer_reviews.text: Great game to purchase and give as s gift. Only odd thing is that it jitters and kind of wish it was bigger so the claw could actually move around decently and get prizes. But good product for the price I payed. I already tried it with small snicker candies and those squishy toys like seen in the video. My son loves it, but he's 2 and just wants to press buttons. Not recommended for his age but great for 5+, like me 🤪😛 Haha
customer_reviews.author: BUFUyo

customer_reviews.title: Real person, real review, real disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this after reading the reviews, all 5 star. Sadly, no, not an awesome claw toy. Super small... claw has VERY limited range & grip... holds only a few small prizes & they fall out b/c the plastic barrier is so short. We’re the other reviews fake??? In this case, real person, real review, real disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Janice G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but loud
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for 7yr old. They only things I wish it had were an adjustable noise option and an option to play the crane with just lights and no music. It's fun but the music gets old and annoying very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Matches with my toy story alien theme
customer_reviews.text: Nice little piece to add to my collection of the green alien from toy story. The claw actually works and provides fun for the kids. Stimulates actual arcade play.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Placed batteries inside machine turned on was able to move claw and then iy stopped working. Thought maybe the batteries were bad and switched them out with new ones and machine started like it was going to work then it stopped and did not come on again. The battery does not seem to be connecting properly
customer_reviews.author: ADA BELL

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Item was broken right out of the box. Claw hung all the way down limply. Would not turn on. To the companies credit they did refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Loud but fun!
customer_reviews.text: It does not seem to have a volume control and is quite loud when the music starts. Otherwise, my son loves it! In fact, we have all tried it and it is fun. Make sure prizes are fairly small (1-1 1/2").
customer_reviews.author: Amy Licher

customer_reviews.title: Crane game
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys claw machine of all types. This one is unique because of its design and he likes being able to push the buttons along with the joysticks! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: “I like it, I like the shape of the rocket ship and the music.” Jack, age 6
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: It broke soon after it was played
customer_reviews.text: Does not work anymore after played a handful of times it won’t work
customer_reviews.author: Haley B

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This item SUCKS it doesnt pick anything up that you put in there, such a waste of money!!! very disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten coleman

customer_reviews.title: Fun party toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! We used for our sons 1st birthday party.Perfect for the Toy Story Theme!! All the kids loved playing with this claw machine
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Awful product.
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Opened in Christmas Day and it lasted for 15 minutes until the claw broke and wouldn’t go down to pick up the candy (see my video). Not only that IT DOESN’T PICK UP CANDY! Aaaaaaaand the music is super loud and annoying repeating the same circus music over and over again. Definitely returning. Thanks for ruining my sons Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

product_meta.title: Bundaloo Claw Machine Arcade Game Candy Grabber & Prize Dispenser, Rocket Vending Toy for Kids with Lights & Sound Best Birthday & Christmas Gifts for Boys & Girls
product_meta.description:
Want to keep your kids entertained during family gatherings?

It’s that time of the year again when family members come over to catch up over food and drinks. Adults mingling on one side, and children, well, they’re everywhere.

You can’t have them stay indoors because they might break something. Having them outdoors, however, is pure chaos. They are running around everywhere, making it hard to make conversation. If only you can keep them entertained in one spot.

With Bundaloo’s Rocket Claw Arcade, children are kept occupied for hours!

Now, you can bring your favorite arcade game home. Our rocket claw arcade is the perfect pastime for both children and adults. It encourages imaginative play and creativity, and also helps improve one’s hand-eye coordination skills.

Fill the arcade with any small items like small wrapped candies that measures up to 2” X 2”. Kids will surely enjoy trying to grab their prize. It’s a challenging game the whole family can play together during parties or after dinner.

Grabbing a prize out of this claw can be pretty tough. Kids won’t win every single time so they need to concentrate and observe. When they do get their prize after several attempts, they will taste the joy of success which is the best thing of all!

Here are more reasons to love our claw arcade:
✅ Plays music at a tolerable level
✅ No need to put coins in. Simply turn on the switch and start playing
✅ Easy to refill with small items for prizes
✅ Quick on and off switch located at the bottom of the toy: no accidentally switching it off
✅ Offers children a cheerful pretend playing experience and sense of thrill

Keep your kids amused with a toy they can play multiple times a day. Add Bundaloo’s Rocket Claw Arcade to your cart TODAY!
feature_bullets: ✅ FUN & ENGAGING - 3, 2, 1…Blast off! This cool rocket claw is just like the real thing, with red blinking lights and jolly carnival music. It’s a super exciting game to play for the whole family!

✅ SIMPLE TO CONTROL - Let your little one improve their coordination skills. It’s easy! Turn the switch that is located on the bottom to the on position, use the left button to activate. Next the joystick to control the claw back, forth, right, left. Use the right button to grab the prize!
✅ HOURS OF EXCITEMENT - This claw machine is the perfect amusement during family gatherings. Great for young and old alike, our arcade-style toy is sure to keep everyone entertained for hours!
✅ EASY TO OPERATE - No complicated tools or assembly required. All you need to start playing and bonding with family is insert 3 double A batteries, flip the power switch and grab away!
✅ IDEAL FOR GIFTING - Here’s something that will surely be a hit with children! This arcade machine feels just like being in a real arcade, making it a great gift for birthdays and Christmases.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars60 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
